channel.title: Linux on THALIUM
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on THALIUM

item.title: ECW 2023: Centralized Memory (write-up)
item.description: Centralized Memory was a hard Linux pwn challenge created for the European Cyber Week CTF 2023 qualifiers. This write-up covers the intended method of exploitation through a race condition, an AES padding bug and a stack overflow.

item.title: kSMBd: a quick overview
item.description: In this blogpost, we introduce the analysis of one SMB implementation: kSMBd. It will be followed up by a talk at OffensiveCon 2023 named “Abusing Linux in-kernel SMB server to gain kernel remote code execution”.
